sentences.en: A carpet of deep green covers most of the rugged landscape, but patches of bare or sparsely vegetated ground occur around the fringes of this image.
sentences.cn: 一片深绿色的地毯覆盖了大部分崎岖的地表，而片片裸地或植被稀疏的地块散布于图片边缘。

sentences.en: He considered a sparsely populated region most suitable, but such regions were few in crowded China.
sentences.cn: 他认为人烟稀少的地方最合适, 可是这样的地方在人口稠密的中国是不容易找到的.

sentences.en: If an entry is only sparsely filled in, the results may look more like Figure 8.
sentences.cn: 如果一个条目只填充了稀疏的内容，那么结果看上去就像图 8 那样。

sentences.en: Instead, user mail files are sparsely distributed across a subset of servers within the cluster.
sentences.cn: 相反地，用户邮件文件稀疏地分布在集群内的部分服务器中。

sentences.en: It is no city, but a forest sparsely scattered with huts.
sentences.cn: 那不是一座城, 那是一片中间疏疏落落地装点着一些房屋的树林.

sentences.en: It was sparsely wooded and desolate.
sentences.cn: 这里树木稀少,荒无人烟.

sentences.en: Nearing lamp - lighting time, the wind dropped and it began to snow sparsely.
sentences.cn: 到快掌灯的时候, 风更小了些,天上落着稀疏的雪花.

sentences.en: Plants from equatorial regions have large, thin sparsely hairy leaves.
sentences.cn: 在赤道地区其植物叶片大而薄,并被以稀毛.

sentences.en: Plants sparsely scabrous; ultimate leaf segments irregularly serrate or dentate.
sentences.cn: 装置疏生粗糙; 不规则的末级的叶裂片有锯齿或具牙齿.

sentences.en: Relative to its size, the city is sparsely populated.
sentences.cn: 与它的面积相比, 这座城市人口极为稀少.

sentences.en: Relative to the size, the city is sparsely populated.
sentences.cn: 与其面积相比, 这个城市的人口是稀少的.

sentences.en: The ground was sparsely covered with grass.
sentences.cn: 地面上稀疏地覆盖草丛.

sentences.en: The mountains are sparsely covered with shrubbery and trees.
sentences.cn: 山上有稀疏的灌木和树覆盖.

sentences.en: The river was sparsely lined with willow trees.
sentences.cn: 河边疏疏落落有几棵柳树.

sentences.en: The Sahara desert is a district sparsely inhabited.
sentences.cn: 撒哈拉沙漠是个人烟稀少的地区.

sentences.en: Unbound mode is also suited for spreadsheet - like or sparsely populated tables.
sentences.cn: 取消绑定模式还适用于类似于电子表格的表或稀疏填充的表.

sentences.en: We took tea by lamplight in his sparsely furnished house.
sentences.cn: 在他那所少有陈设的房子里，我们坐在灯下喝着茶。

trans.tran_cn: 稀疏地，稀少地，不足地，贫乏地
